'''Arcana of Zipacna''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Land of Tleyaoyotl]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 132]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* ''{{w|Zipacna}}'' in {{w|Maya mythology}}, was a large caiman god who often boasted about creating mountains. He and his brother, {{w|Cabrakan}} (Earthquake), were often considered demons. He was defeated by Hunahpu and Xbalanque, the two divine Hero Twins.
